analyzed: candrakāntā bhikṣuṇīkṛtaḥ
om namaḥ uvalokiteśvarāya
bhuvanatraya vandita loka gurum amara adhipati stuta brahma varam
muni rāja varam dyuti siddhi karam praṇamāmi avalokita nāma dharam
sugata ātmaja rupa su rupa dharam bahu lakṣaṇa bhūṣita deha varam
amita ābha tathāgata mauli dharam kanaka abja vibhūṣita vāma karam
kuṭila amala piṅgala dhūmra jaṭam śaśi bimba samujjvala pūrṇa mukham
kamala āyata locana cāru varam hima khaṇḍa vipāṇḍura gaṇḍa yugam
adharam jita paṅkaja nābhi samam śarad ambuda garjita megha rutam
bahu ratna vibhūṣita bāhu yugam tanu komala śādvala pāṇi talam
mṛga carma viveṣṭita vāma tanum śubha kuṇḍala maṇḍita lola dharam
vimalam kamala udara nābhi talam maṇi maṇḍita mekhala hema varam
kaṭi veṣṭita citra su vastra dharam jina bodhi mahā udadhi pāra gatam
bahu puṇyam upārjita labdha varam jvara vyādhi haram bahu saukhya karam
vividha ākula nirjita māra balam daśa pāramitā parama artha karam
maṇi nūpura garjita pāda yugam gaja manda vilambita haṃsa gatim
paripūrṇa mahā amṛta labdha dhṛtim kṣīroda jala arṇava nitya gatim
śrīpotalaka abhinivāsa ratim karuṇā āmaya nirmala cāru dṛśam
śrīmat āryāvalokiteśvara bhaṭṭārakasya candrakāntā bhikṣuṇī viracitaḥ stavaḥ
samāptaḥ
